# html-has-lang

<html> elements must have the lang prop.

#### References

>>>>>>> master

## Rule details

This rule takes no arguments.

### Succeed
```jsx
<html lang="en">
<html lang="en-US">
<html lang={language}>
```

### Fail

```jsx
<html>
```
